itemInfo.itemDesc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff

item.name: Steel
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards and Coal together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Ash Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from an Ash Tree using a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Ash Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Goblin Cave, Ehwaz Hill, Balenos Forest, and Wolf Hills. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Ash Trees.

item.name: Monk's Branch
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Monk's Branch requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Trace of Death
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment. It can be obtained through Excavation.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Seleth Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Grade 1 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Staff
item.desc:
A Seleth staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Seleth staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff

item.desc: A staff possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.
